website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Workout Ultraknit stays away from its more massive Reebok training ancestors and gives a contemporary flair to the everyday casual wear by introducing Ultraknit materials.With a sleek look and a vintage appeal, the sneaker seems to blend well with almost any article of clothing in a vessel that delivers uncontested comfort. Gym sessions would be a breeze considering its highly breathable material.
pros: One user received a lot of compliments on the Reebok Workout Ultraknit’s styling
It was a very comfortable sneaker according to more than half of the reviewers with a customer even commending the suppleness around the ankles
The mesh material allows excellent airflow which was witnessed by one purchaser
Many loved the attractive style of the mid top sneaker
Few buyers were astounded that the sneaker blends well with almost any article of clothing
A handful of users received the right kind of fit with the Reebok Workout Ultraknit
It doubles as a good work shoe, according to a wearer
A couple of commenters pinpointed that the sneaker looks precisely like the ones online
cons: One customer said it was a bit pricey
The sneaker has limited colorway options which are only available in black and white

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could love these!
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I wear a 7-7.5 in men and ordered a 7 but these were too small. I tried walking around in them to see if I could break them in but NOPE. They hurt. Also, I was expecting these to be white!!! They were white on one side and cream/dirty looking on the other. I don't understand how they were even discolored like this. There was also a yellow stain on the rubbery plastic part for the shoelaces. I wanted to love them but I couldn't. Nice structure though.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Best overall shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these as an everyday shoe and for impromptu lifting and he loves them. They don’t look like a ridiculous lifting/crossfit shoe either so that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Orr-Himmel

customer_reviews.title: Meh so so at best...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes had a yellow tint to the plastic pieces. Comfortable and breathable but runs at least a size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Thoresen

customer_reviews.title: Good product better for the summer
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe as I am a fan of Reebok classics, and these give me a little different look.
customer_reviews.author: C kid

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs one for me and my gf and we love them
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband just bought these and the look and quality are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes lol really cool and they fit 100%good, I love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ankle hurts after wearing it.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe constantly rubs against my ankle bone, making it super uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jerryli

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It feels weird and unsupportive for the kind of sport I'm playing (squash).
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i ordered. Only need thing bad was shoelaces we’re dirty and ends crushed
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Insoles aren’t that good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking shoes the size ran a little bigger for what I got. In the insoles suck but once I switched them out I wear them every day
customer_reviews.author: rkayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves these shoes, got for him on father's day.
customer_reviews.author: Bcast

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I only use these at the gym and i love them
customer_reviews.author: Russell Harvey
